document_data.name: Watcher
document_data.mainbody: The '''Watcher''', or '''He Who Watches and Waits''', was a [[yak-man|yikarian]] inhabiting the body of [[Makin al-Mutrattab]] in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Golden Huzuz|51}}
document_data.Personality: The Watcher was extremely patient and cautious, making him the perfect fit for a spy within the [[Court of Enlightenment]].
document_data.Activities: The Watcher possessed Makin's body after he was subdued and kidnapped by a pair of [[earthservant]]s working for the [[Unspeakable]]. The Watcher gained access to all of Makin's memories, and used his position as the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph's]] favorite cousin to learn vital information about the royal family. The Watcher reported everything he learned by communicating ''[[Telepathy|telepathically]]'' with the Unspeakable.{{cite book/City of Delights/Golden Huzuz|44}}
